name: 8o0ty - Booty Rebooted
description:
You can now play the classic 1984 8 bit game Booty on your Android.
Rebooted to have a slightly different setting but the puzzles are the same.

10% of revenue from adverts will go to Blood Cancer charities.

Help 8o0ty collect 125 batteries across 20 screens and then find the exit to get back to Mrs 8o0ty.

Use coloured keys to get through the coloured doors.

* Play offline.
* Small Install.
* No special permissions required.
* Retro gaming.

Purple Viking Games
